sentences.english: This is a Chinese cultural treasure.
The palace contains many art treasures.
sentences.chinese: 这宫殿里藏有许多艺术瑰宝。

sentences.english: Wudang Golden Hall is the gem of Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 武当金殿是中华民族的国之瑰宝。

sentences.english: The rock paintings in Cangyuan are the treasure of the Yunnan minority culture.
sentences.chinese: 沧源崖画是云南少数民族文化艺术遗产中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: It has been China's outstanding literary heritage and the world's literary treasures.
sentences.chinese: 唐诗是中国优秀文学遗产之一，是世界文学瑰宝。

sentences.english: The Longmen Grottoes are one of the three major treasure houses of stone carving in China.
sentences.chinese: 龙门石窟是中国三大石窟瑰宝之一。

sentences.english: Taoism and Chinese Medicine are two great treasures of Chinese original culture.
sentences.chinese: 道教与中医学是中华本土文化的两大瑰宝。

sentences.english: Based on the idea of Ren(being humane), people attach importance to man-oriented management.
sentences.chinese: 民本管理是中国传统管理宝库的瑰宝。

sentences.english: Foot massage goes back to ancient times. It's a gem of the treasure-house of the traditional Chinese medical science.
sentences.chinese: 足部按摩源远流长，为中国传统中医学宝库中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: The folk songs of SHE-Minority are the treasure of She traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 畲族民歌是畲族传统文化中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: The round-backed armchair is a rarity in the antique traditional furniture of our country.
sentences.chinese: 圈椅是我国传统家具中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: Classic poesy is the treasure of Chinese culture which is accumulated for thousand of years in china .
sentences.chinese: 中华民族几千年积累的古典诗歌，是中化文化的瑰宝。

sentences.english: The national culture is a treasure in the greatness and resplendence of the national culture.
sentences.chinese: 民族文化是中华伟大文明和灿烂文化中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: Liling is a ceramic You Xia of Chinas national treasure of traditional arts and crafts.
sentences.chinese: 醴陵釉下彩瓷是我国民族传统工艺美术之瑰宝。

sentences.english: Chinese and French idiomatic phrases are treasures in both languages.
sentences.chinese: 法汉熟语都是语言中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: Sandstone is the key to Nottingham's unique subterranean heritage, he said.
sentences.chinese: 砂岩是诺丁汉地下绝世文物瑰宝存在的关键之处。

definition: lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
treasure-house/treasury/treasure-trove (often fig., book of treasured wisdom)
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance

pinyin: Fei1 wu4 zhi4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3

definition: handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
